```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
std_basis <- list(
  v1 = c(1, 0, 0),
  v2 = c(0, 1, 0),
  v3 = c(0, 0, 1)
)
```

```{r}
lop <- function(f) {
  structure(f, class = c("lop", class(f)))
}
```

```{r}
as.matrix.lop <- function(f, basis = NULL) {
  if(is.null(basis)) {
    basis <- std_basis
  }

  n <- length(basis)
  vs <- map(basis, f)
  lift_vl(matrix)(vs, n)
}
```

```{r}
f <- function(u) {
  stopifnot(length(u) == 3)
  x <- u[1]
  y <- u[2]
  z <- u[3]
  c(x + y, 2*x + 3*y, z - 3*y)
}
f <- lop(f)

F <- as.matrix(f)
F
```

```{r}
w <- c(3, 2, -4)
f(w)
F %*% w
```

```{r}
g <- function(u) {
  stopifnot(length(u) == 3)
  x <- u[1]
  y <- u[2]
  z <- u[3]
  c(x - y, -2*x + 6*y, -2*z + 5*y)
}
g <- lop(g)

G <- as.matrix(g)
G
```

```{r}
F %*% G %*% w

f(g(w))
```

```{r}
`+.lop` <- function(f, g) {
  function(...) {
    f(...) + g(...)
  }
}
```

```{r}
(f + g)(w)
f(w) + g(w)
F + G
(F + G) %*% w
```
